RESOLVED_ENTITIES.United States Court of Appeals for the F: United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that made unassailed findings regarding the segment of Interstate Highway 35 where Maria De Jesus Garcia's pickup truck was stopped
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Court of Appeals for the F: court that relied upon an agent's observation of occupants' appearances in determining reasonable suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: law enforcement agency whose agents apprehended illegal alien smugglers and had reason to suspect the presence of illegal aliens in Maria De Jesus Garcia's pickup truck
